item.description:
Saludos desde Jamaica Plain,

Planning another event for Brunch in JP.

Location: Canary Square. (former Alchemist)

April 27th

Time: 10:30am

This event is for all speakers.

You could drive in and find parking near by on So. Huntington or Center St, and it can be accessed by Green Line (Heath St and 10 minute walk), or by #41, or #39 buses.

Want to limit to 20 people.

NOTE: Please make sure that if you cannot make it, to update your RSVP.

I will be taking note of No-Shows, and in future brunches would have to block you if 3 or more No-shows are registered.  This is allow people in the Waiting List be able to attend.

Thank You.

Hope to see you for Cafe and Brunch.

 

Ernesto
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the group talking Spanish around the left side of the restaurant

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch in Jamaica Plain (Canary Square) April 27th
